verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
One drop of Your Precious blood
One spark of Your Spirit's fire
Courses through Me like a flood
God's consuming fire!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rivers of eternal Life
Flow from hearts believing
But their Source Lies far beyond
In the Savior's bleeding

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Grafted branches in the vine
Fruitful when abiding
Spirit flowing like new wine
God's own heart confiding

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
One drop of Your Precious blood
One spark of Your Spirit's fire
Courses through Me like a flood
God's consuming fire!
